about_the_game:
• 交流qq群：873210170
  • 微博/b站/小红书：三更梦工作室

  • About the Demo:You will experience the prologue and the first chapter of the game, which takes about one hour to complete. The full version, to be released in the future, will offer around six hours of gameplay.


  • The story takes place in an ancient and distant kingdom—Shermanland.
Located at the pinnacle of the World Tree—Sherman Tree, scholars fortunate enough to have visited this place are amazed by its beauty and wonder, hailing it as the “Gods’ Backyard.”
Historical records and mythological tales recount its existence, which has since faded into the past.
In the year 504 of the Sherman calendar, in October, the favored child of the gods fell from the sky, turning to ashes within days.
Later scholars believe that this event is closely related to the power struggles between the Blood Clan, the Human Clan, the Royal Clan, and the Witch Clan.
Surrounding them, a mysterious blond boy seems to be the key to unraveling all the mysteries…

  • To save his brother Kander Dahl and his companions, the story's protagonist, Carter Evan, takes a daring risk alone. After failing to negotiate with the Sherman Royal Family, he is executed. However, at the moment of his death, a mysterious force sends him back to Shermanland five years earlier. Evan vows to take a different path and protect those who are important to him. Throughout his journey, Evan forms deeper bonds with his companions.：
Fighting side by side with his brother, he saw the clumsy tenderness beneath his stern exterior...
Witnessing the gentle and kind-hearted young prince grow into a king, steadily advancing toward his rightful throne...
The mysterious figure in the cycle of reincarnation, the cat-loving mage who has watched over for millennia, finally catches him this time...
The evil blood clan he fought against all the way, yet they share a fateful bond from a past life. In the relentless struggle, it is unclear who will fall first...
And then there's the cautious and timid deputy captain of the self-defense force, who never backs down at critical moments; the rough and bold tavern owner; the shrewd yet principled flower vendor; the loyal royal servant; and the adorable heterochromatic Persian cat...

  • The various "unexpected surprises" he encountered on his journey gave Evan the courage to face all the harsh realities.
The united tribes' conspiracy, the man-eating blood vine incident, the refugee riots, the impending withering of the Sherman Tree, the return of the Blood Clan, the royal family's rule teetering on the edge...
Why did the royal family still fall after eradicating the roots of corruption?
Why did the important people still die before his eyes, even after preventing the downfall of the dynasty?
Every time he reached a dead end, who was the one that killed him and yet granted him rebirth?


Time and again, surviving desperate situations, returning to the starting point at the cost of his life, and repairing and strengthening his bonds with "them," can Evan ultimately turn the tide?



  • Carter iven
The protagonist of this story, Carter Evan, is a young man who loves adventure and possesses a lot of peculiar knowledge.
He once lived with his brother, Kander Dahl, at the Hyacinth Orphanage. After reaching adulthood, he was taken away by his biological parents, leading the brothers down very different paths.
In a battle, he died after failing to negotiate with the royal family, only to be sent back to the world five years earlier by a mysterious force.

  • Cander Daer/b][/list]
    "This gamble won't endanger your life; that's the luckiest thing for me."
    The cheerful and confident young leader of the self-defense force, Kander Dahl, is an extremely protective older brother.
    Due to his father, Kander Ray, the leader of the revolutionary army, Dahl was considered an ominous presence by those around him from a young age. Yet, he ultimately ended up following the same path as his father by a twist of fate.
    After Evan arrived at the Hyacinth Orphanage, Dahl took it upon himself to act as Evan's guardian, considering himself his older brother.

    • Sherman Haer
    "May you always remain clear-minded and upright, accompanying me through the chaotic night."
    Sherman Hall is a warm-hearted yet scheming young prince, lacking some common knowledge that ordinary people have, and possessing a dual personality.
    As a prince of Shermanland, he never set foot outside the palace due to the queen's strong protection. After coming of age, Hall left the capital to travel and met Evan.
    Through his interactions with Evan, Hall began to contemplate what it means to be a truly wise ruler and started to resist the evil force within him that tempted him towards corruption and downfall.

    • Julius
    "If I can meet you again in the end, then the future path will not be a wrong one."
    A mysterious cat-loving shaman who can foresee the future.
    Julius is the second oldest being on the Sherman continent, surpassed only by the Sherman Tree God. He has existed since the continent was in chaos thousands of years ago, always acting as the agent of the gods. However, his approach has recently changed, as if something has made him realize that there are many things in the world that cannot be defined by rules.

    • Vlad
    "Under the tide of times, ordinary people are nothing but a speck of dust in history. I merely lit the fuse."
    A powerful and insane vampire cursed with immortality.
    Vlad has been operating among humans as the deputy director of the Inspectorate, but his true identity is that of the leader of the vampire clan that was exterminated two hundred years ago. His ultimate wish is to achieve true death, for which he has devised a mad plan spanning centuries.


    • You will experience four extraordinary relationship and romance modes: Brother and Brother, Monarch and Knight, God and Follower, Vampire and Prey.
    • Multiple playthroughs, exploring the truth from different perspectives.
    • Nearly 300,000-word game script with 10 endings waiting for you to explore.
    • Rich character stories, dynamic and handsome character illustrations, and a variety of expressions.
    • Dozens of exquisite scenes and CGs, along with a stunning opening and cutscene animations.



    • About the Studio: Midnight Dream Studio is dedicated to peering into a fraction of the vast universe, turning boundless dreams into magnificent adventure games. We hope to share a joyful journey with all adventurers.
    For collaboration inquiries, please send an email to: 1322503980@qq.com

name: 回到终局之始 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: 'End’s beginning' is a Japanese-style fantasy romance visual novel. As Carter Evan, uncover the truth behind his death and Shermanland's fall. With a nearly 300,000-word script, experience four unique relationships: Brother and Brother, Monarch and Knight, God and Follower, and Vampire and Prey.
